sect1.title: Iterables
sect1.para: Iterable is a built-in compile time type alias for arrayTraversable. From its introduction in PHP 7.1.0 and prior to PHP 8.2.0, iterable was a built-in pseudo-type that acted as the aforementioned type alias and can be used as a type declaration. An iterable type can be used in &foreach; and with yield from within a generator.
